Losungen.Losungstext: for God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.
And whenever you stand praying, forgive, if you have anything against anyone, so that your Father also who is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.”
As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you. Abide in my love.

Like newborn infants, long for the pure spiritual milk, that by it you may grow up into salvation— But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for his own possession, that you may proclaim the excellencies of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light.
Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own
The Lord is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation; this is my God, and I will praise him, my father’s God, and I will exalt him.

And he said, “I will make all my goodness pass before you and will proclaim before you my name ‘The Lord.’ And I will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, and will show mercy on whom I will show mercy.
Salt is good, but if the salt has lost its saltiness, how will you make it salty again? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace with one another.”
the Lord appeared to him from far away. I have loved you with an everlasting love; therefore I have continued my faithfulness to you.
Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
And we have the prophetic word more fully confirmed, to which you will do well to pay attention as to a lamp shining in a dark place, until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts,
my soul waits for the Lord more than watchmen for the morning, more than watchmen for the morning.
